Description: Sandstone stela of Makarios; pediment at the top; cross below; five lines of Greek text. Description in Hall: Gabled, with akroteria. In the gable is a medallion, on each akroterion a small cross pattée. Hatched ornament on raised border of the gable. Inscription. Below, cross within wreath: medallions in spandrels of panel.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.133, Pl.94)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 94:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
